data: The thread "Project Phoenix Update" has the subject "Project Phoenix Update" and communicates the weekly progress report on Project Phoenix.
The thread "Project Phoenix Update" reports that the UI module has been completed.
The thread "Project Phoenix Update" reports that backend integration work has started.
The thread "Project Phoenix Update" requests prioritization of API authentication tasks for the week.
The thread "Project Phoenix Update" requests preparation of a project demo by Friday.
The thread "Project Phoenix Update" facilitates coordination of project tasks between the project management team and the technical lead.
